text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.title: Sticky Hoppers Configuration
text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.option.gen:
Sticky Hoppers can use a "Recipe" to filter out non-stackable items!
The Recipe use a Book to define the sorting conditions,
otherwise the Permissions are the same for all Sticky Hoppers.

See the "Sticky Hopper" page on CurseForge for more details!
text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.option.rec:
Define the recipe here,
i.e. the objects to be placed in the inventory of a Sticky Hopper
so that it can sort a non-stackable item.
Write "item" to define the location of the item to sort,
"book" for the location of the Book, if desired,
and the full name of other items in the Recipe
(for example: "minecraft:comparator").
text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.option.per:
Permissions to filter according to certain conditions.
If the Book is not used (not defined in the Recipe),
these Permissions are global to all Sticky Hoppers.

Allow to sort independently..
text.autoconfig.sticky_hopper.option.boo:
The Book can be a Book And Quill or a Written Book.
If you use it, you can define here the keywords to be written
in its first page so that the sorting conditions are effective
(provided that it is also validated by the Permissions).

Keyword to ignore..
